snippet: Across the globe, coral reefs have been savaged by rising sea temperatures, overfishing, pollution and ocean acidification. As Bettina Wassener reports on the Green blog, marine researchers have gathered in Cairns, Australia, for the International...
abstract: Across the globe, coral reefs have been savaged by rising sea temperatures, overfishing, pollution and ocean acidification. As Bettina Wassener reports on the Green blog, marine researchers have gathered in Cairns, Australia, for the International Coral Reef Symposium, issuing a call for efforts to stave off further degradation of the reefs.

headline.main: How to Rescue the World's Coral Reefs?
